name: Jewel Star
description:
Connect 3 or more jewels together to make them disappear. Match lightning, blast, and star jewels for bigger bonuses and combos. With easy to use controls, fun and friendly graphics, and over 200 levels to play, this game is fun for the whole family!

• Over 200 levels with more coming soon!
• Fun new jigsaw puzzle mini-game
• Collect daily rewards to improve your gameplay
• Dragons, wizards, castles, and more
